Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Walton/Dearborn
ShortDescription: Eastbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Dearborn, Oak, Clark and Division due to street blockage near Walton/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Dearborn, Oak, Clark and Division due to street blockage near Walton/Dearborn.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Northbound Reroute near Walton/Dearborn
ShortDescription: Northbound 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Division and Clark due to street blockage near Walton/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Division and Clark, due to street blockage near Walton/Dearborn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute at Milwaukee/Division
ShortDescription: SB 56 Milwaukee  buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Ashland, Augusta, and Milwaukee due to, construction near Milwaukee/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee  buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Ashland, Augusta, and Milwaukee due to, construction near Milwaukee/Division.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Austin. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Austin.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.       

Allow extra travel time.
